name: Organisation of Islamic Cooperation (OIC)
focus: Promoting solidarity among Muslim-majority countries, advancing peace, and fostering cooperation in economic, cultural, and scientific fields.

name: North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO)
focus: Ensuring collective defense and security cooperation among member countries, primarily in North America and Europe.

name: BRICS
focus: Enhancing economic and political cooperation among emerging economies to promote global governance reform and sustainable development.

name: Group of Seven (G7)
focus: Coordinating economic, security, and climate policies among advanced democracies to promote global stability and prosperity.

name: Group of Twenty (G20)
focus: Addressing global economic stability, climate change, and sustainable development through cooperation among major economies.

name: United Nations (UN)
focus: Maintaining international peace, promoting human rights, and fostering global cooperation on economic, social, and environmental issues.
